Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a pale-red pottery vessel, the fabric is relatively coarse and grey-black in section, the interior is covered with a light-brown deposit, the exterior is covered with a red-brown slip and smudged traces of seven lines of black-painted demotic text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393889) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393889)
